ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Agent::StateTypes
ConfigItem.Description: List of state types which can be used in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Customer::StateTypes
ConfigItem.Description: List of state types which can be used in the customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Public::StateTypes
ConfigItem.Description: List of state types which can be used in the public interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Default::RootCategoryName
ConfigItem.Description: Default category name.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Default::RootCategoryComment
ConfigItem.Description: Default category name.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Voting::Rates
ConfigItem.Description: Rates for voting. Key must be in percent.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Item::Voting::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show voting in defined interfaces.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Path::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show FAQ path yes/no.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::ItemList::VotingResultDecimalPlaces
ConfigItem.Description: Decimal places of the voting result.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::ItemList::VotingResultColors
ConfigItem.Description: CSS color for the voting result.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::QuickSearch::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Interfaces where the quick search should be shown.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show last change items in defined interfaces.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::ShowSubCategoryItems
ConfigItem.Description: Show items of subcategories.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastChange::Limit
ConfigItem.Description: Number of shown items in last changes.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show last created items in defined interfaces.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::ShowSubCategoryItems
ConfigItem.Description: Show items of subcategories.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::LastCreate::Limit
ConfigItem.Description: Number of shown items in last created.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::Show
ConfigItem.Description: Show top 10 items in defined interfaces.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::Limit
ConfigItem.Description: Number of shown items in the top 10 feature.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Explorer::Top10::ShowSubCategoryItems
ConfigItem.Description: Show items of subcategories.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::FAQHook
ConfigItem.Description: The identifier for a FAQ, e.g. FAQ#, KB#, MyFAQ#. The default is FAQ#.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TitleSize
ConfigItem.Description: Default maximum size of the titles in a FAQ article to be shown.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Default::State
ConfigItem.Description: Default state for FAQ entry.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalRequired
ConfigItem.Description: New FAQ articles need approval before they get published.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalGroup
ConfigItem.Description: Group for the approval of FAQ articles.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalQueue
ConfigItem.Description: Queue for the approval of FAQ articles.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketSubject
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket subject for approval of FAQ article.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketBody
ConfigItem.Description: Ticket body for approval of FAQ article.

Setting.TextArea:
Hi,
a new FAQ article needs your approval before it can be published.
FAQ# : <OTRS_FAQ_NUMBER> Title : <OTRS_FAQ_TITLE> Author : <OTRS_FAQ_AUTHOR> State : <OTRS_FAQ_STATE>
If you want to do this, click on this link:
<OTRS_CONFIG_HttpType>://<OTRS_CONFIG_FQDN>/<OTRS_CONFIG_ScriptAlias>index.pl?Action=AgentFAQEdit;ItemID=<OTRS_FAQ_ITEMID>
Your OTRS Notification Master

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketDefaultState
ConfigItem.Description: Default state of tickets for the approval of FAQ articles.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::ApprovalTicketType
ConfigItem.Description: Default type of tickets for the approval of FAQ articles.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8301
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'FAQ' objects using the 'Normal' link type.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8302
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'FAQ' objects using the 'ParentChild' link type.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8303
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'Ticket' objects using the 'Normal' link type.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::PossibleLink###8304
ConfigItem.Description: This setting defines that a 'FAQ' object can be linked with other 'Ticket' objects using the 'ParentChild' link type.

ConfigItem.Description: Maximum size of the titles in a FAQ article to be shown in the FAQ Explorer in the customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###FAQ

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::OutputFilterTextAutoLink###FAQ
ConfigItem.Description: A filter for HTML output to add links behind a defined string. The element Image allows two input kinds. First the name of an image (e.g. faq.png). In this case the OTRS image path will be used. The second possibility is to insert the link to the image.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###InsertMethod
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the information to be inserted in a FAQ based Ticket. "Full FAQ" includes text, attachments and inline images.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###IncludeInternal
ConfigItem.Description: Include internal fields on a FAQ based Ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowFieldNames
ConfigItem.Description: Include the name of each field in a FAQ based Ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowInsertTextButton
ConfigItem.Description: Show "Insert FAQ Text" / "Insert Full FAQ" Button in AgentFAQZoomSmall.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowInsertLinkButton
ConfigItem.Description: Show "Insert FAQ Link" Button in AgentFAQZoomSmall for public FAQ Articles.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###ShowInsertTextAndLinkButton
ConfigItem.Description: Show "Insert FAQ Text & Link" / "Insert Full FAQ & Link" Button in AgentFAQZoomSmall for public FAQ Articles.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::TicketCompose###UpdateArticleSubject
ConfigItem.Description: Define if the FAQ title should be concatenated to article subject.

ConfigItem.Description: Enable multiple languages on FAQ module.

ConfigItem.Description: Default language for FAQ articles on single language mode.

ConfigItem.Description: List of CSS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Voting
ConfigItem.Description: Enable voting mechanism on FAQ module.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::CacheTTL
ConfigItem.Description: Cache Time To Leave for FAQ items.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0398-FAQ-LastChange
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the parameters for the dashboard backend. "Limit" defines the number of entries displayed by default. "Group" is used to restrict access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" indicates if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually.

ConfigItem.Name: DashboardBackend###0399-FAQ-LastCreate
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the parameters for the dashboard backend. "Limit" defines the number of entries displayed by default. "Group" is used to restrict access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" indicates if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###FAQ
ConfigItem.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

ConfigItem.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable###FAQ
ConfigItem.Description: Define which columns are shown in the linked FAQs widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Note: Only FAQ attributes and Dynamic Fields (DynamicField_NameX) are allowed for DefaultColumns. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Available, 2 = Enabled by default.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::CustomerFAQRelatedArticles###DefaultLanguages
ConfigItem.Description: The default languages for the related FAQ articles.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::CustomerFAQRelatedArticles###ShowLimit
ConfigItem.Description: Output limit for the related FAQ articles.

ConfigItem.Name: FAQ::Frontend::CustomerFAQRelatedArticles###VoteStarsVisible
ConfigItem.Description: Show the stars for the articles with a rating equal or greater like the defined value (set value '0' to deactive the output).
